name: IG-88 (V)
Lore: 'Bounty hunter. Went berserk upon activation. Murdered all designers at Holowan Mechanicals. IG-88''s outstanding ''dismantle on sight'' warrant ignored by Darth Vader.',
Text: 'Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. May use two weapons. Once per turn, if escorting a captive, may take any one card from Force Pile into hand; reshuffle. May lose 1 Force to cancel a just drawn weapon destiny targeting IG-88. Immune to attrition < 5.',
